resources.string: 我啱啱出世架咋，好多嘢都仲學習緊，容許我邊學邊做啦;)

1. MallMall 查不會要求您提供個人資料，請勿在對話中透露任何個人資料。
2. MallMall 查是全自動化服務，對一般查詢所提供的資料僅供參考。
3. 對話内容將會被分析，用作提升MallMall 查準確度及質素，以及提供客户服務之用。
Hi everyone, please welcome my new day of born. I am a newborn with lots to learn. Greatly appreciate your kind understanding.

1. MallMall Chat will not request you to provide personal information. Please do not disclose any personal information during the conversation.
2. MallMall Chat is an automated service, and information provided for general enquiries is for reference only.
3. The conversation content will be analyzed and used to enhance MallMall Chat\'s accuracy and quality, as well as the purpose of providing customer services.
